a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Trust in others vs. trust in police, Europe, 2013
Average rating of trust in others (rating from 0 to 10 in EU-SILC survey) vs. Average rating of trust in the police
(rating from 0 to 10 in EU-SILC survey). The size of each bubble represents GDP per capita (after adjusting for
Data source: Trust – Eurostat (2015), Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
